eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED A 911 TELEPHONE OUTAGE EMERGENCY FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Otero, NM; AT 12:00 PM ON DEC 03, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:00 PM DEC 04, 2025. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
911 service in Otero County, including Mescalero, has been fully restored.
Calls are now routing normally to TBRDA.

Thank you for your patience during the outage.
